rooms.description: A spacious entrance with a reception area following Vastu principles ensuring proper energy flow.
Open-plan living space that integrates kitchen and dining area, emphasizing Brutalist style with raw concrete finishes.
Integrated into the open plan, featuring a functional layout and ample storage in line with local design practices.
A comfortable bedroom placed in the north-east direction to promote positive Vastu energy. Features a private balcony overlooking the garden area.
Compact space located adjacent to service areas for ease of access while maintaining privacy and adherence to local norms.
